A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: a very disappointing Star Wars movie\, it abandoned and abruptly ended many threads from Episode 7 that were meant to be decently resolved or explored. it did nothing to further the story of the trilogy in that we're basically where we were when Ep 7 ended. Finn was relagated to tertiary character and used in a useless subplot. I have no anticipation for Ep 9 now\, and I'm not sure how good a movie it can be given that this movie left it with very little to work with.
